name: Crushing Defeat
effect: Opponent's Turn: Count the cards in the attacker's battle pile. He or she loses that much spin.

name: Dragoon, Champion's Beyblade
effect: Your Turn: When your Character fails a test, you may lose 1 spin to discard the opponent's test card and test that Character again.

name: Dranzer, Power Beyblade
effect: Opponent' Turn: When your opponent tests a card against you, you may put your test card in your hand instead of discarding it.

name: Ensnare
effect: Your Turn: After you refill your hand this turn, you may take this Action and put it back in your hand.

name: How a Champion Plays
effect: Your Turn: Show your hand and count the colors in it. The defender loses that much spin.

name: I've Had It With You All!
effect: Your Turn: You may remove 1 of your Characters. If you do, then you may remove up to 2 opponent's Characters.

name: Impressing the Fans
effect: Opponent's Turn: Count the different colors on your Characters. You gain that much spin.

name: In Complete Control
effect: You may take all cards in your battle pile and put them back in your hand.

name: Kai, Bladebreaker
effect: Your Turn: When you win a battle, if this is the only blue Character any player has, the defender loses 1 spin.

name: Max, Bladebreaker
effect: Your Turn: When you win a battle, you may discard a green card to gain 1 spin.

name: Ray, Bladebreaker
effect: When you win a battle, you may discard a card.

name: The Brains Behind the Brawn
effect: Your Turn: Count your Characters. You may draw that many cards. If you do, the defender counts his or her Characters and may draw that many cards.

name: Too Much Power to Handle
effect: Opponent's Turn: If the attacker stops this Action, you may remove 1 of his or her Characters.

name: Tyson, Bladebreaker
effect: When you win a battle, you may discard a red card to make an opponent lose 1 spin.
